languages.text: "Не бойся за Вольного Торговца, Торбальд. Я видел {mf|его|ее} в деле, и это еретику надо страшиться их встречи".
"Worry not for the Rogue Trader, Thorbald. I've seen {mf|him|her} in action — it's the heretic who best beware meeting {mf|him|her}."
languages.original_text: "Не бойся за Вольного Торговца, Торбальд. Я видел {mf|его|ее} в деле, и это еретику надо страшиться их встречи".

traits.locale_text: "Worry not for the Rogue Trader, Thorbald. I've seen {mf|him|her} in action — it's the heretic who best beware meeting {mf|him|her}."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Worry not for the Rogue Trader, Thorbald. I've seen {mf|him|her} in action — it's the heretic who best beware meeting {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: "Worry not for the Rogue Trader, Thorbald. I've seen {mf|him|her} in action — it's the heretic who best beware meeting {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: "Worry not for the Rogue Trader, Thorbald. I've seen {mf|him|her} in action — it's the heretic who best beware meeting {mf|him|her}."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “不必担心行商浪人，索巴德。我见过{mf|他|她}是怎么战斗的，那群异端分子应该该怕{mf|他|她}才对。”
languages.original_text: "Worry not for the Rogue Trader, Thorbald. I've seen {mf|him|her} in action — it's the heretic who best beware meeting {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: “不必担心行商浪人，索巴德。我见过{mf|他|她}是怎么战斗的，那群异端分子应该该怕{mf|他|她}才对。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Ne t'inquiète pas pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, Thorbald. Je l'ai {mf|vu|vue} à l'œuvre : c'est l'hérétique qui devrait redouter le moment où il croisera sa route. »
languages.original_text: "Worry not for the Rogue Trader, Thorbald. I've seen {mf|him|her} in action — it's the heretic who best beware meeting {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: « Ne t'inquiète pas pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, Thorbald. Je l'ai {mf|vu|vue} à l'œuvre : c'est l'hérétique qui devrait redouter le moment où il croisera sa route. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者の心配はいらん、トールバルド。俺はヤツが戦う姿を見たことがある…身構えねばならぬのは、ヤツと対峙する異端者の方だ」
languages.original_text: "Worry not for the Rogue Trader, Thorbald. I've seen {mf|him|her} in action — it's the heretic who best beware meeting {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者の心配はいらん、トールバルド。俺はヤツが戦う姿を見たことがある…身構えねばならぬのは、ヤツと対峙する異端者の方だ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «No te preocupes por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, Thorbald. L{mf|o|a} he visto en acción, y es el hereje el que debería temer el encuentro».
languages.original_text: "Worry not for the Rogue Trader, Thorbald. I've seen {mf|him|her} in action — it's the heretic who best beware meeting {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: «No te preocupes por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, Thorbald. L{mf|o|a} he visto en acción, y es el hereje el que debería temer el encuentro».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Sorgt Euch nicht um {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}, Thorbald. Ich habe {mf|ihn|sie} in Aktion gesehen. Er ist der Ketzer, der sich davor hüten sollte, {mf|ihm|ihr} zu begegnen."
languages.original_text: "Worry not for the Rogue Trader, Thorbald. I've seen {mf|him|her} in action — it's the heretic who best beware meeting {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: "Sorgt Euch nicht um {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}, Thorbald. Ich habe {mf|ihn|sie} in Aktion gesehen. Er ist der Ketzer, der sich davor hüten sollte, {mf|ihm|ihr} zu begegnen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir için endişelenmene gerek yok Thorbald. Kendisini işbaşında gördüm. Asıl onunla karşılaşacakları için kâfirler endişelenmeli."
languages.original_text: "Worry not for the Rogue Trader, Thorbald. I've seen {mf|him|her} in action — it's the heretic who best beware meeting {mf|him|her}."
